attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to be english,I want the same rights as people from other countries and/or religions in my own country,I do not want to be cast as racist or BNP for wanting to be ENGLISH and PROUD

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
